title: World of candies
text: You read a magazine about different types of candies. You never knew there were so many!

title: Castles
text: You've read a beautiful book about building castles in rainy weather. You feel more knowledgeable now.

title: Trebuchets
text: You read about a trebuchet that has been used years ago to knock stone walls. You feel more knowledgeable.

title: Wizards
text: You read a book about a mighty wizard living lonely in a tower in the mountains. You're inspired by his ability to invoke lightnings from the sky.
